option.name: testKind
option.value: Regular expression

option.name: searchTest
option.value: In single module
read should latch a read request
read should latch valid output data
valid should latch the valid signal
wait should latch the wait signal
write should latch a write request
decode should split a bitvector value into a sequence of bitvectors
edge should detect edges
falling should detect falling edges
hold should hold a signal
latch should latch and clear a signal
latchSync should latch a signal when the trigger is asserted
latchSync should latch and clear a signal
padWords should pad words packed into a bitvector
pulseSync should trigger a pulse
rising should detect rising edges
rotateLeft should rotate the bits to the left
rotateRight should rotate the bits to the right
sync should generate a sync pulse for rising edges of the target clock
toggle should toggle a bit
FSM should move to the check state after latching a cache entry
FSM should move to the evict state after a dirty write hit
FSM should move to the fill state after a read miss
FSM should move to the fill state after a write miss

FSM should move to the latch state after a request
FSM should move to the merge state after a line fill
FSM should return to the idle state after a read hit
FSM should return to the idle state after a write hit
FSM should return to the idle state after writing a cache entry
FSM should return to the latch state after a read hit (chained)
FSM should return to the latch state after a write hit (chained)
FSM should return to the latch state after writing a cache entry (chained)
data width ratios should read a word (16:16)
data width ratios should read a word (16:8)
data width ratios should read a word (8:16)
data width ratios should read a word (8:8)

read should assert the wait signal

read should fill a cache line during a miss
read should fill a cache line during a miss (wrapping)

write should evict a dirty cache entry before writing to the cache
write should fill a cache line during a miss
write should write to the cache during a hit

write should write to DDR memory (burst=1)

FSM should move to the erase state when writing is enabled

FSM should move to the idle state when chip select is deasserted
FSM should move to the read state after receiving a read command

FSM should move to the shift state after the write state
FSM should move to the write state when writing is enabled
FSM should move to the write wait state after receiving serial data
FSM should move to the write wait state after the erase state
erase should erase a word in memory
erase should erase all words in memory
idle should assert the serial data output
read should read a word from memory
write should write a word to memory
write should write all words to memory
should assert the burst done signal
should assert the valid signal
should assert the wait signal
should mux the request to the input port with the highest priority
FSM should move to the active state

FSM should move to the read state
FSM should move to the refresh state
FSM should move to the write state
FSM should return to the idle state from the read state
FSM should return to the idle state from the refresh state
FSM should return to the idle state from the write state
addressing should select a bank
idle should deassert the wait signal
idle should perform a NOP
initialize should initialize the SDRAM

read should assert the wait signal

should decode sample values
FSM should assert the ready signal during the idle state

pipeline should apply pan

FSM should move to the done state after processing all channels

PCM data should fetch PCM data for the channels

active should assert the active signal when a channel is playing
active should deassert the active signal when a channel has reached the end address
done should assert the done signal when a channel has reached the end address
done should not assert the done signal when a channel is inactive

done should not assert the done signal when the loop end address is equal to the end address

playing should sum the channel outputs
should handle min/max sample values
should interpolate sample values
IRQ should assert the IRQ signal for channels that are done
IRQ should not assert the IRQ signal for masked channels

should wrap a static counter with zero length

should output the registers
